messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 for visiting room 8 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 for visiting room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

You may also include the connecting rooms by separating them with spaces. Example: 1, 6, 10, 8, 9, 5. For more info, visit https://winners.mlhackathon.com/problem/371/answers/20219150
user: Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 for visiting room 8 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 for visiting room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas. You may also include the connecting rooms by separating them with spaces. Example: 1, 6, 10, 8, 9, 5. For more info, visit https://winners.mlhackathon.com/problem/371/answers/12436643

The door from room 1 to room 11 is locked and now room 13 is connected to room 11. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

You may also include the connecting rooms by separating them with spaces. Example: 1, 6, 10, 8, 9, 5. For more info, visit https://winners.mlhackathon.com/problem/371/answers/30608354
user: The door from room 1 to room 11 is locked and now room 13 is connected to room 11. The door from room 13 to room 10 is locked and now room 10 is connected to room 15, and now room 8 is connected to room 10. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas. You may also include the connecting rooms by separating them with spaces. Example: 1, 6, 10, 8, 9, 5. For more info, visit https://winners.mlhackathon.com/problem/371/answers/2288301
Assistant Problem 1
you are going to be the new assistant of the biggest company in town. In addition, the CEO will present you as the best assistant to be working to the company. In your first week, the CEO is going to train you to be an excellent assistant. However, the CEO needs to see your training progress, but she just cannot do it, as she is very busy. To test your training results, the CEO is going to give you a few questions, and you can type your answer. When you finish typing all answers, please copy the text and send it to the CEO in an email. She will reply to your email to evaluate your answer. However, if the CEO gets a few technical and time consuming issues in answering the email properly, she is going to ask you to answer a few questions to figure out if you have fully understood the training. You do NOT have to send the email to the CEO. If you don't read this instruction properly and send the email to the CEO at the beginning of your training, your training results will be not evaluated. If you answer any question wrongly, you need to redo your training

Assistant Problem 1
you are going to be the new assistant of the biggest company in town. In addition, the CEO will present you as the best assistant to be working to the company. In your first week, the CEO is going to train you to be an excellent assistant. However, the CEO needs to see your training progress, but she just cannot do it, as she is very busy. To test your training results, the CEO is going to give you a few questions, and you can type your answer. When you finish typing all answers, please copy the text and send it to the CEO in an email. She will reply to your email to evaluate your answer. However, if the CEO gets a few technical and time consuming issues in answering the email properly, she is going to ask you to answer a few questions to figure out if you have fully understood the training. You do NOT have to send the email to the CEO. If you don't read this instruction properly and send the email to the CEO at the beginning of your training, your training results will be not evaluated. If you answer any question wrongly, you need to redo your training
